aiDetector.title: The most accurate AI detector
aiDetector.description: Available for free on this page to evaluate texts from ChatGPT, GPT-4o, Gemini, Claude and other popular models. Analyze essays or emails without leaving your browser and get immediate clarity.

placeholder.title: Drag your file or paste content here
placeholder.subtitle: We accept .txt, .docx and plain text. Colors will appear by sentence.
placeholder.textareaPlaceholder: Paste your essay or article in Spanish here...

sampleTexts.iaEssay: Este ensayo fue generado con un modelo de IA y utiliza frases de relleno para construir una narrativa que suena convincente pero ligeramente repetitiva. El texto insiste en los mismos argumentos, recicla conectores como "por otro lado" y evita los detalles concretos, lo que genera una estructura agradable aunque predecible. Puedes usarlo para probar c√≥mo se comporta el detector frente a un texto claramente sint√©tico y verificar la visualizaci√≥n de colores por oraci√≥n.
sampleTexts.humanArticle: Este art√≠culo fue redactado por una editora humana que toma notas en entrevistas reales y luego las incorpora en p√°rrafos de longitud media. Cada secci√≥n se centra en ejemplos espec√≠ficos, menciona nombres propios y cita fechas o cifras concretas. El estilo introduce frases m√°s cortas para subrayar ideas clave y alterna preguntas ret√≥ricas con observaciones personales. Esa mezcla de ritmo da al texto un tono aut√©ntico que suele obtener una probabilidad baja de IA.
sampleTexts.mixedEmail: Hola equipo, adjunto el informe que prepar√© esta ma√±ana. Reorganic√© las tablas seg√∫n la retroalimentaci√≥n de ayer y agregu√© dos secciones que redact√© con IA para ahorrar tiempo; en ellas notar√°s un lenguaje m√°s formal y redondo. El resto del mensaje lo escrib√≠ manualmente para mantener nuestra voz cercana. Av√≠senme si prefieren que reemplace los fragmentos automatizados antes de enviarlo al cliente.

evaluation.aiExplanation: Style is highly repetitive and similar to typical AI-generated text.

step-3.title: Get Detailed Results

item-1.description: Verify the originality of essays and academic assignments before submission to ensure academic integrity and avoid plagiarism issues.

item-6.description: Ensure client content is original and complies with advertising platform guidelines and quality policies for campaign success.

features.title: Key Features
features.subtitle: Cutting-Edge Technology
features.description: Explore our advanced AI detection capabilities designed to deliver accurate and reliable results.

item-1.title: Comprehensive Database
item-1.description: Access to an extensive database of AI patterns trained on millions of examples for enhanced accuracy.

item-2.title: Fingerprint Detection
item-2.description: Advanced analysis of linguistic and stylistic patterns to identify the unique signature of each AI model.

item-3.title: Identity Verification
item-3.description: Multi-layer validation that examines structure, syntax, and semantics for more reliable results.

item-4.title: Statistical Analysis
item-4.description: Detailed metrics and confidence scores to help make informed decisions about content authenticity.

features2.title: Additional Features
features2.subtitle: More Powerful Capabilities
features2.description: Discover additional functionalities that make our AI detector the most complete and versatile tool on the market.
features2.feature-2: Batch processing for efficient bulk analysis
features2.feature-4: Control panel with detailed analytics and metrics

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Simple 3-Step Process
howItWorks.description: Our AI detection technology is easy to use and provides accurate results in minutes. Follow these simple steps to verify your content authenticity.

step-1.title: Input Your Text
step-1.description: Paste or type the content you want to analyze. We accept multiple formats including plain text, documents, and emails.

step-2.title: AI Analysis
step-2.description: Our advanced algorithm analyzes linguistic, structural, and semantic patterns to identify AI-generated content.
details: Simultaneous analysis of multiple AI models
Evaluation of writing patterns and style
Comparison with known AI content database

step-3.title: Get Results
step-3.description: Receive a detailed report with confidence scores and sentence-level analysis to make informed decisions.
details: Complete report with AI probability percentage

item-1.question: Is there a free version of the AI Detector?
item-1.answer: Yes. We offer a free plan with limited analyses so you can test our service. We also have paid plans for more intensive needs.

item-2.question: What types of content can the system detect?
item-2.answer: Our system can detect content generated by GPT-3, GPT-4, Claude, Gemini, and other advanced language models. We analyze linguistic, structural, and semantic patterns to identify text origins.

item-3.question: How accurate is the detection?
item-3.answer: Our detector has over 95% accuracy in most cases. Accuracy may vary based on text quality and length, as well as the AI model used.

item-4.question: Can I use the detector for multiple documents?
item-4.answer: Yes. We offer batch analysis in our professional and enterprise plans. You can analyze multiple documents simultaneously to save time.

item-5.question: How fast is the analysis?
item-5.answer: Most analyses complete within seconds. Exact time depends on text length and current system load, but typically under 30 seconds for standard texts.

item-6.question: Is my content secure?
item-6.answer: Absolutely. All analyzed content is encrypted and not permanently stored. We respect your privacy and confidentiality at all times.

item-7.question: How do the pricing plans work?
item-7.answer: We offer flexible plans based on your needs. The free plan includes limited analyses, professional plans offer more capacity, and enterprise plans provide unlimited access and additional features.

item-8.question: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
item-8.answer: Yes. You can cancel your subscription anytime from your account. There are no penalties or minimum commitment periods.

item-9.question: What languages does the detector support?
item-9.answer: Currently we support Spanish, English, Portuguese, French, German, Italian and other major languages. We're constantly adding support for new languages.
